title: I would Like my ip Please.
body:
http://puu.sh/tVWlr/91cbb74251.jpg 
http://puu.sh/tVWti/5805ef7274.jpg
http://puu.sh/tVWtZ/5965ddd641.jpg
http://puu.sh/tVWzL/ae48c77e26.jpg

So.....I started an Account and wanted to buy a new character Twisted Fate.

I tried buying and it said I had not enough IP however I had enough on the top of my screen.

I then looked at my match history to see how much I was earning. and it equaled 1362 (not sure why it said 1363 on the client but yeah)


So May I please have my IP back? if possible a bonus for this screw up? no problems if not.{{champion:4}}

replies.body:
There were some issues with store IP balances not updating after the store issues the other day. You should be able to resolve this by swapping over to the Legacy Client from the login screen to complete your purchase.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this helped!
